verses.verse: At this <WH2063> also my heart <WH3820> trembleth <WH2729> <WH8799>, and is moved out <WH5425> <WH8799> of his place <WH4725>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> attentively <WH8085> <WH8800> the noise <WH7267> of his voice <WH6963>, and the sound <WH1899> that goeth out <WH3318> <WH8799> of his mouth <WH6310>.
He directeth <WH3474> <WH8765> it <WH8281> <WH8799> under the whole heaven <WH8064>, and his lightning <WH216> unto the ends <WH3671> of the earth <WH776>.

After <WH310> it a voice <WH6963> roareth <WH7580> <WH8799>: he thundereth <WH7481> <WH8686> with the voice <WH6963> of his excellency <WH1347>; and he will not stay <WH6117> <WH8762> them when his voice <WH6963> is heard <WH8085> <WH8735>.
'Elohim <WH410> thundereth <WH7481> <WH8686> marvellously <WH6381> <WH8737> with his voice <WH6963>; great things <WH1419> doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> he, which we cannot comprehend <WH3045> <WH8799>.

For he saith <WH559> <WH8799> to the snow <WH7950>, Be thou <WH1933> <WH8798> on the earth <WH776>; likewise to the small <WH4306> rain <WH1653>, and to the great <WH4306> rain <WH1653> of his strength <WH5797>.
He sealeth up <WH2856> <WH8799> the hand <WH3027> of every man <WH120>; that all men <WH582> may know <WH3045> <WH8800> his work <WH4639>.
Then the beasts <WH2416> go <WH935> <WH8799> into <WH1119> dens <WH695>, and remain <WH7931> <WH8799> in their places <WH4585>.
Out of the south <WH2315> cometh <WH935> <WH8799> the whirlwind <WH5492>: and cold <WH7135> out of the north <WH4215>.
By the breath <WH5397> of 'Elohim <WH410> frost <WH7140> is given <WH5414> <WH8799>: and the breadth <WH7341> of the waters <WH4325> is straitened <WH4164>.
Also by watering <WH7377> he wearieth <WH2959> <WH8686> the thick cloud <WH5645>: he scattereth <WH6327> <WH8686> his bright <WH216> cloud <WH6051>:

And it is turned <WH2015> <WH8693> round about <WH4524> by his counsels <WH8458>: that they may do <WH6467> whatsoever he commandeth <WH6680> <WH8762> them upon the face <WH6440> of the world <WH8398> in the earth <WH776>.
He causeht it to come <WH4672> <WH8686>, whether for correction <WH7626>, or for his land <WH776>, or for mercy <WH2617>.
Hearken <WH238> <WH8685> unto this, O I-yov <WH347>: stand still <WH5975> <WH8798>, and consider <WH995> <WH8708> the wondrous <WH6381> <WH8737> works of 'Elohim <WH410>.
Dost thou know <WH3045> <WH8799> when 'Elohim <WH433> disposed <WH7760> <WH8800> them, and caused the light <WH216> of his cloud <WH6051> to shine <WH3313> <WH8689> ?
Dost thou know <WH3045> <WH8799> the balancings <WH4657> of the clouds <WH5645>, the wondrous works <WH4652> of him which is perfect <WH8549> in knowledge <WH1843> ?
How thy garments <WH899> are warm <WH2525>, when he quieteth <WH8252> <WH8687> the earth <WH776> by the south <WH1864> wind ?
Hast thou with him spread out <WH7554> <WH8686> the sky <WH7834>, which is strong <WH2389>, and as a molten <WH3332> <WH8716> looking glass <WH7209> ?
Teach <WH3045> <WH8685> us what we shall say <WH559> <WH8799> unto him; for we cannot order <WH6186> <WH8799> our speech by reason <WH6440> of darkness <WH2822>.
Shall it be told <WH5608> <WH8792> him that I speak <WH1696> <WH8762>? if a man <WH376> speak <WH559> <WH8804>, surely he shall be swallowed up <WH1104> <WH8792>.
And now men see <WH7200> <WH8804> not the bright <WH925> light <WH216> which is in the clouds <WH7834>: but the wind <WH7307> passeht <WH5674> <WH8804>, and cleanseht <WH2891> <WH8762> them.
Fair weather <WH2091> cometh <WH857> <WH8799> out of the north <WH6828>: with 'Elohim <WH433> is terrible <WH3372> <WH8737> majesty <WH1935>.

Touching 'El SHaddai <WH7706>, we cannot find him out <WH4672> <WH8804>: he is excellent <WH7689> in power <WH3581>, and in judgment <WH4941>, and in plenty <WH7230> of justice <WH6666>: he will not afflict <WH6031> <WH8762>.
Men <WH582> do therefore fear <WH3372> <WH8804> him: he respecteth <WH7200> <WH8799> not any that are wise <WH2450> of heart <WH3820>.
